ATTRIBUTS.ITEM: BEGIN OF confirmed_objects, count TYPE td_count, t_status TYPE tt_status_list, END OF confirmed_objects `

ITEM.TEXT: Table name of the main table used by this component

ITEM.SOURCE: ` TRY. IMPORT msg = data FROM DATA BUFFER rawdata. **CX_SY_CONVERSION_CODEPAGE **CX_SY_IMPORT_MISMATCH_ERROR **CX_SY_IMPORT_FORMAT_ERROR CATCH cx_root. ENDTRY.

` * No lock unique ID * _lock( process_id = process_id * lock_mode = ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>lock_modes-exclusive ). DELETE FROM ygplmt_messages WHERE process_id = o_process->process_id. IF sy-subrc <> 0. SELECT SINGLE process_id into my_key FROM ygplmt_messages WHERE process_id = o_process->process_id. IF sy-subrc = 0. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_database EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_database=>delete_failed tablename = my_table key_value = my_key. ENDIF. ENDIF.

` DATA it_msg TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ygplmt_messages. DATA it_tmp_msg TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ygplmt_messages. * data it_arch_msg TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ygplmt_msgs_arch. DATA s_msg_arch TYPE ygplmt_msgs_arch. DATA it_messages TYPE tt_msgs. DATA s_msg LIKE LINE OF it_messages. DATA it_sys_msgs TYPE tt_msgs. DATA o_cx TYPE REF TO cx_root. FIELD-SYMBOLS <m> LIKE LINE OF it_msg.
* Get global Lock on object processing. get_semaphore( ). TRY. SELECT * INTO TABLE it_msg FROM ygplmt_messages WHERE process_id = o_process->process_id. IF NOT it_msg IS INITIAL. message_readed = abap_true. it_tmp_msg = it_msg. DELETE it_tmp_msg WHERE arch IS INITIAL. LOOP AT it_tmp_msg ASSIGNING <m>. CLEAR s_msg_arch. s_msg_arch-key = <m>-key. s_msg_arch-data = <m>-data. INSERT ygplmt_msgs_arch FROM s_msg_arch. ENDLOOP. FREE it_tmp_msg.
DELETE ygplmt_messages FROM TABLE it_msg. COMMIT WORK AND WAIT. ENDIF. CATCH cx_root INTO o_cx. release_semaphore( ). RAISE EXCEPTION o_cx. ENDTRY. * Release global Lock on object processing. release_semaphore( ).
CHECK NOT it_msg IS INITIAL.
SORT it_msg BY timestamp category. LOOP AT it_msg ASSIGNING <m>. CLEAR s_msg. MOVE-CORRESPONDING <m> TO s_msg. APPEND s_msg TO it_messages. ENDLOOP.
it_sys_msgs = it_messages. DELETE it_sys_msgs WHERE NOT category IN ygpl_mt_categories=>r_system_categories. DELETE it_messages WHERE category IN ygpl_mt_categories=>r_system_categories.
IF NOT it_sys_msgs IS INITIAL. handle_system_messages( it_sys_msgs ). ENDIF.
IF NOT it_messages IS INITIAL. handle_specific_messages( it_messages ). ENDIF.
` CHECK NOT o_process->conditions->categories->is_valid_category( category ) IS INITIAL. _send_message( archive = archive category = category message = message ).

LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* use this source file for any type declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature

ITEM.SOURCE: ` ASSERT o_process IS BOUND. set_process( o_process ).
` IMPORT msg = any FROM DATA BUFFER buffer.
` EXPORT msg = any TO DATA BUFFER result COMPRESSION ON.

`
IF NOT f_semaphore IS INITIAL. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_locks EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_locks=>semaphore_already_defined object_name = 'Message Semaphore'(tms). ENDIF. * Get global Lock on object processing. ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>get_messages_semaphore( o_process->process_id ). f_semaphore = abap_true.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA status TYPE tt_status_list. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <statut> LIKE LINE OF status.
decode_data( EXPORTING buffer = msg_data CHANGING any = status ).
LOOP AT status ASSIGNING <statut>. ADD <statut>-count TO confirmed_objects-count. COLLECT <statut> INTO confirmed_objects-t_status. ENDLOOP.

` FIELD-SYMBOLS: * <data> TYPE ANY, * <dt> LIKE LINE OF msg_cat_types, <msg> LIKE LINE OF messages.
DATA: * _data TYPE REF TO data, _has_failed TYPE td_boolean.
CHECK NOT messages IS INITIAL. LOOP AT messages ASSIGNING <msg>. ** Get Categorie data Type * READ TABLE msg_cat_types WITH TABLE KEY cat = <msg>-categ ASSIGNING <dt>. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * _has_failed = abap_true. * DELETE msgs. * CONTINUE. * ENDIF. * ** Create specific data Type * TRY. * CREATE DATA _data TYPE (<dt>-type). * CATCH cx_sy_create_data_error. * _has_failed = abap_true. * DELETE msgs. * CONTINUE. * ENDTRY. * ** Need to use field symobl * ASSIGN _data TO <data>. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * _has_failed = abap_true. * DELETE msgs. * CONTINUE. * ENDIF. * ** Convert stored information into this data type * TRY. ** IMPORT msg = _data FROM DATA BUFFER <msg>-msg_data. ** This command is refused by ABAP Compiler ** IMPORT msg = <data> FROM DATA BUFFER <msg>-msg_data. **CX_SY_CONVERSION_CODEPAGE **CX_SY_IMPORT_MISMATCH_ERROR **CX_SY_IMPORT_FORMAT_ERROR * CATCH cx_root. * _has_failed = abap_true. * DELETE msgs. * CONTINUE. * ENDTRY.
* Call external event handler RAISE EVENT new_specific_message EXPORTING category = <msg>-category rawdata = <msg>-msg_data. ENDLOOP.
**Raise exception if one of the message couldn't be processed * IF _has_failed = abap_true. RAISE failed. ENDIF.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** FIELD-SYMBOLS <msg> LIKE LINE OF messages. DATA f_obj_conf TYPE td_boolean. DATA s_task TYPE ts_process_definition. DATA s_cond TYPE string. DATA o_cond TYPE ti_conditions.
LOOP AT messages ASSIGNING <msg>. CASE <msg>-category. WHEN system_categories-obj_conf. f_obj_conf = abap_true. handle_object_confirmation( <msg>-msg_data ). WHEN system_categories-task_def. decode_data( EXPORTING buffer = <msg>-msg_data CHANGING any = s_task ). RAISE EVENT task_definition_recieved EXPORTING task_definition = s_task. WHEN system_categories-condition. decode_data( EXPORTING buffer = <msg>-msg_data CHANGING any = s_cond ). * o_cond = ygpl_mt_factories=>create_new_run_conditions( ). * o_cond->deserialize( s_cond ). o_cond ?= ygpl_mt_conditions_task=>deserialize( s_cond ). RAISE EVENT new_running_conditions EXPORTING conditions = o_cond. WHEN OTHERS. * Unexpected messages type ENDCASE. ENDLOOP.
IF f_obj_conf = abap_true. RAISE EVENT objects_confirmed EXPORTING object_count = confirmed_objects-count status = confirmed_objects-t_status. CLEAR confirmed_objects. ENDIF.

`
CHECK f_semaphore IS NOT INITIAL. * IF f_semaphore IS INITIAL. * RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_locks * EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_locks=>semaphore_not_set * object_name = 'Message Semaphore'(tms). * ENDIF. * Get global Lock on object processing. ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>release_messages_semaphore( o_process->process_id ). CLEAR f_semaphore.
` DATA conditions TYPE string. conditions = condition->serialize( ). _send_message( archive = archive category = system_categories-condition message = conditions ).

ITEM.TEXT: Send system message to DB (DO NOT USE)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` CHECK NOT ygpl_mt_categories=>is_system_category( category ) IS INITIAL. CHECK NOT o_process->is_system_message_allowed( ) IS INITIAL.
_send_message( archive = archive category = category message = message ).

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * **********************************************************************
* CALL METHOD _lock * EXPORTING * run_id = run_id * EXCEPTIONS * foreign_lock = 1 * sys_failure = 2 * OTHERS = 3. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.
* IF _run-run_id <> run_id. DELETE FROM ygplmt_messages WHERE process_id = run_id.
* COMMIT WORK AND WAIT. * * CALL METHOD _unlock( run_id = run_id ).
` CALL FUNCTION 'GUID_CREATE' IMPORTING EV_GUID_16 = MSG_ID. * EV_GUID_22 = * EV_GUID_32 =

` DATA _msg TYPE ygplmt_messages.
_msg-message_id = _generate_msg_id( ). _msg-process_id = o_process->process_id. _msg-category = category. _msg-username = sy-uname. _msg-arch = archive.
_msg-msg_data = encode_data( message ).
GET TIME STAMP FIELD _msg-timestamp. INSERT ygplmt_messages FROM _msg. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.

TYPES.ITEM: BEGIN OF ts_msg. * Adding Table Key for delete include type ygpl_mt_messages_key. types: timestamp type ygplmt_messages-timestamp, category type ygplmt_messages-category, msg_data type ygplmt_messages-msg_data, end of ts_msg `
tt_msgs TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ts_msg `
